PAPER 2 – RESOURCES BOOKLET

Tuesday 18 November 2014 (morning)




INSTRUCTIONS TO CANDIDATES

 Do not open this resources booklet until instructed to do so.
 Use the resources as appropriate to the questions in paper 2.

Option F — The geography of food and health
11.     The map shows the changes between 1970 and 2010 in the average life expectancy for different regions of the world.

                                                                                      +7.9 years                                           Eastern Europe
                                                                                                                                             and Russia
